About me

The movie Three Idiots piqued my interest when I was a student of 9th grade. This went on for long enough for me to complete an engineering degree. I’m an Industrial & Production Engineer from Ahsanullah University of Science and Technology (AUST). Here, I learnt how engineering and business can be molded into a single cavity. Through the PTAK & business competition, I began to understand about supply chain. Furthermore, I was always fascinated by how an organization worked from start until the end. It eventually lead me down several rabbit holes, and I soon discovered an entirely different universe in this sector. So now I'm doing my best to achieve the excellence and learn the nuts and bolts; there is to know about it.

Traits

Focused, Flexible, Technologically Competent

Interests

Travelling, Music, Sports

Tools

MS Office Suite, SAP, CAD, Anaplan

Professional Experience

Reckitt Bangladesh Ltd

  • Procurement Officer | Dec 2020 - Present

I am currently employed as a PO, where I work directly with the global procurement team to handle 350 SKUs of RM-PM items and implement commodity plans, should cost models, Supply chain finance, commodity trend monitoring and internal-external benchmarking etc. Also working to initiate and implement innovative BCP,PPV and NPD-EPD projects with cooperation of R&D, packaging and legal team.

Fair Electronics Ltd

  • Executive-SCM | Nov 2019 - Dec 2020

I had previously worked in the SCM as an Executive in charge of sourcing for the Complete-Knocked-Down (CKD) and Semi-Knocked-Down divisions. In addition, I kept track of payment difficulties and worked with the finance department to streamline the VAT, AIT, and Supplier Relationship Management processes (SRM). The $4 million SMT technology transfer project was my largest project for FEL-Samsung.
